com.force.sdk.springsecurity
Class ForceRememberMeServicesTest

java.lang.Object
  com.force.sdk.springsecurity.ForceRememberMeServicesTest

public class ForceRememberMeServicesTest
extends java.lang.Object

This ForceRememberMeServicesTest tests ForceRememberMeServices and SecurityContextServiceImpl. It verifies:

  • loginsuccess stores session
  • autologin uses the stored session
  • setSecurityContextToSession
  • clearSecurityContext
